title: Game Freezing / Black Screen
body: Mind you, this has only been happening today since the recent windows 10 update, so I think it might have ruined my computer's compatibility with the league client. Every time I try to get into game, the loading screen freezes before the champion portraits show up. Tried doing custom with friend to see if game would continue to load regardless, but it stopped loading. Ended up tabbing out and reopening, and it finally loaded but I got a black screen. Continued to see a black screen until, strangely, I was screen sharing on Skype. Game runs in windowed mode, but windowed mode messes with my camera movements. Wondering if there was any way to fix this or just hope that the next patch will address this ;P

replies.body:
The Windows 10 anniversary update made some rather large changes to the Xbox game bar and enabled the game DVR feature by default. Since this issue has been causing certain issues in League around low FPS and game crashes, I recommend temporarily disabling DVR entirely to see if it resolves your issue. You can do so by following our guide [here](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).

Let me know if this helped.

I got the same exact problem now but i got this problem in windows 7. 
Strangely it works when i make a custom game with a friend but it doesn't work when i add bots or play a pvp game.
Anyone know how to fix this ?
